A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was terrible.  From Poe's crank call to Snoke's whatever-death it was just garbage.  There is obviously no continuity or overarching plan for this trilogy.  It's no surprise that the NBC-owned Rotten Tomatoes rated this movie so highly; it's also not a surprise that the audience score tells the REAL tale of how this movie was.  Less than 50% of the people who saw it liked it.  Thanks for crashing the most iconic movie series of all time.  Complete trash
